remarks: Diophantine set builder for equality of polynomial expressions.  Note that the two expressions need not be nonnegative; only variables are so constrained.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)
statement:
eqrabdioph $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ ( t e. ( ZZ ^m ( 1 ... N ) ) |-> A ) e. ( mzPoly ` ( 1 ... N ) ) /\ ( t e. ( ZZ ^m ( 1 ... N ) ) |-> B ) e. ( mzPoly ` ( 1 ... N ) ) ) -> { t e. ( NN0 ^m ( 1 ... N ) ) | A = B } e. ( Dioph ` N ) ) $.
$d N t $.
